description.value:
This teardrop-shaped piece of smooth amber is warm to the touch and grants its bearer a feeling of calmness and serenity.

Property: Once per day, while clutching the tear of the hamadryad , you gain a 1d4 bonus to any saving throw or ability check.

data.name: Tear Of Hamadryad
data.author: sGDyf0LH8KxxtfaW
